name: AudioVerse Alexa Skill
description:
Development of Alexa Skill to play the latest, trending, and featured sermons from AudioVerse, also play sermons by speaker. Commands:

  • Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play new sermons

  • Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play trending sermons

  • Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play featured sermons

  • Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play sermons by [speaker]

Once the audio is playing, this skill allows it to shuffle, go to next or previous, start over or the user can ask to hear sermons from a different speaker.

name: Media Upload Manager
description:
Internal tool developed to manage all the media file uploads to our server. This tool was integrated in the admin application and works as a standalone app. It was developed to allow multi-uploads of large files.

The backend is a vanilla Node.js application that provide the API for create, rename and delete files and folders also provide a service for streaming multi-uploads. The front-end was developed in React with server side rendering and hot module reloading through Webpack, for the UI was used React Components implementing Google's Material Design, Babel for ES6 support, webpack for bundling, Redux to manage the app state, ESLint to maintain a consistent code style and mocha to allow writing unit tests.

name: AudioVerse Android App
description:
AudioVerse is a website dedicated to spreading God's word through free sermon audio. The AudioVerse App allows access to a vast library of sermons, seminars, lectures, and audio books.

Improved Features:

  • Download your favorite messages to listen to later--even without an Internet connection.

  • Share your favorite sermon through various social media outlets with just a tap of the finger.

  • Listen to Audio Bible and Audio Books.

New Features added:

  • Facebook and Google+ login

  • Synchronize and manage favorites and playlists

  • Stream video presentations (when available)

  • Listen to presentations at faster speeds

  • Additional sponsors and series.

name: Recording Console
description:
Development of recording console to record court hearings in multiple tribunals; hearings are streamed and recorded on the central server and each participant and their role is stored in the database to know what person spoke at any given time.

The backend is a NodeJS application that provides the real time binary streaming using websockets and encodes the binary data into WAV/MP3 files; the frontend was developed in AngularJS.

name: Court Management System
description:
Consulting and Development of new version of SGT [Court Management System] web app with AngularJS, Gulp, Bower, SASS, and bootstrap; the application controls the information in court cases within the Judicial System of Guatemala

Implemented OAuth Server.

name: Children and Adolescents
description:
Development of control system measures and locations for the protection of children and adolescents in Guatemala, using AngularJS, and bootstrap.

Collaborated with international organizations Buckner International and Tyler Technologies to implement control systems within the judicial system.
